channel.title: [PI] Stupid NPC Buying problem. [PI]
channel.description: Just short and simple: Ive tried to add a shop, and I did, I've added the items and everything on there, yes it says you can buy this item for coins, not points, but why can't I buy the item?

item.title: [PI] Stupid NPC Buying problem. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

[quote=“mod djuice20, post:2, topic:366989”]Please provide more information such as,

The tut you followed, or the code you entered.
OR the message it gives when trying to buy a item.[/quote]

There is no message when I try to buy the item, I click “buy one” and as I have stated that it doesn’t ask for points it asks for cash; but I can’t figure out why it won’t allow me to buy the item from the store; hence the problem.

Read full topic
